name: Retriever of Souls
description:
Update 31OCT 2021: Fixed a bug where it took considerably more time to kill foes than in the editor. Needed to use FixedUpdate() instead. Now to track down other bugs...

Keyboard / Gamepad

Move - A or D / Left Stick

Jump - Space / South Button

Target - Shift / Left Trigger

Attack - Left Mouse / Right Trigger

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Death screwed up, and needs your help to retrieve souls that weren't meant for the netherworld. Made for Mini Jam 92 with the theme of DEATH, and the limitation of YOUR HEALTH IS YOUR WEAPON!

Feedback greatly appreciated, and thanks for playing!
